newsitem.title: MEXICO: Mexico shrs trading electronically, prices delayed.
newsitem.headline: Mexico shrs trading electronically, prices delayed.

text.p: Mexican stocks have been trading electronically all morning but the transaction data have not been released to the public, a stock exchange spokesman said on Wednesday.
But floor trading has been delayed because of a protest by students and their parents that blocked the entrance of the stock exhcange building, the spokesman said.
"If by 0930 (1430 GMT) nothing has been arranged with these people, we are going to free up the system (and release trading results)," the spokesman told Reuters, asking that his name be withheld.
Earlier Wednesday, traders from two major brokerage houses said stocks were not trading electronically, but the bolsa spokesman disputed those claims.
As of 0935 local time/1030 EDT/1435 GMT, trading data had not been transmitted to computer terminals tied to the automated trading system, known by its Spanish acronym SATO.
